attributes.additional_details: With over 4 million signatures already petitioning the government to hold a 2nd EU referendum within 5 days of voting; with the market response to Brexit being so deep and immediate; the significant number of post Leave voter regrets following the realisation that the Leave campaign was fuelled by lies and the divided nation we now have as a result of the 52:48 victory, the government should not invoke article 50, but explore and assess all the alternatives, including a further referendum.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government, the opposition and all MP's to vote against invoking article 50.
